DLMtool Functions 6.0.0
  • Management Procedures

Age-based Catch Curve

CC.Rd

Age-based Catch Curve

CC(x, Data, reps = 100, plot = FALSE)

Arguments

x

Iteration number
Data

An object of class Data
reps

Number of reps
plot

Logical. Show the plot?

Value

A vector of length reps of samples of the negative slope of the catch-curve (Z)

Examples

CC(1, MSEtool::SimulatedData, plot=TRUE)

#>   [1] 0.5041802 0.4828416 0.5410889 0.5313224 0.5142491 0.5366618 0.5154998
